comments.body: There was a gpg_version >= 1.4.16 check in the old version. Is this not needed here?

That old check were kind of weird.

https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/v2.3.1.0-1/test/integration/targets/git/tasks/tag-verification.yml#L10-L11

The `or` logic resulting in a new enough GnuPG version negating the need for a new enough Git version.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  when: >
    not gpg_version.stderr and
    gpg_version.stdout and
    git_version.stdout | version_compare("2.1.0", '>=')
- include: localmods.yml
